name: The Advenjar
description:
The Advenjar

The Advenjar is a computer-based mini-game that combines the genre of RPG, puzzle, and adventure. With a Christmas theme, The Advenjar’s storyline revolves around a Christmas elf who accidentally breaks a Christmas present at work, then needs to replace it with a DIY-version of the same present. 

The player will play as the Christmas elf and go on a short adventure to collect the required items to create the DIY present. Follow the trail to find each item, solve the puzzling path, and build up the final present to save Christmas day!
